page.title: 03Housing in Balmullo
page.content:
Balmullo is situated on the A92 which links Dundee with Cupar. It has become much bigger in the past few years, as many new houses (mainly bungalows) have been built. Many people came to live in Balmullo because of its location. It is within easy travelling distance of Dundee, Cupar, St. Andrews and Glenrothes and many of the new residents work in one of these towns. Many are also stationed at R.A.F. Leuchars, which is just two miles away.
However, the houses in Main Street are much older. We have seen photographs of the village which were taken in the 19th Century and this part of it has hardly changed at all. We therefore have quite an interesting contrast in designs of houses.
